overview: 2001 Duration: 8’00” Screening Format: DV Filming Format: Super 8 Original Soundtrack: O Grivo Photographed and edited by: Cao Guimarães Directed by: Cao Guimarães e Rivane Neuenshwander "Word/World" is a video about communication. The uncannily organised world of ants is faced with two strange objects/actions. To speak and to eat: everything goes through the mouth.
title: Word/World
